Scripts.OnLoad: local sizeX, sizeY = self:GetSize() local midX = sizeX - 26 local midY = sizeY - 28 self.left:SetSize(13, midY) self.right:SetSize(13, midY) self.top:SetSize(midX, 14) self.bottom:SetSize(midX, 14) self.middle:SetSize(midX, midY)

Scripts.OnClick: local mode, subMode = GetLFGMode(LE_LFG_CATEGORY_LFD); if ( mode == "queued" or mode == "listed" or mode == "rolecheck" or mode == "suspended" ) then LeaveLFG(LE_LFG_CATEGORY_LFD); else local leader, tank, healer, dps = GetLFGRoles() SetLFGRoles( false, self:GetParent().roles.tank.checkButton:GetChecked(), self:GetParent().roles.healer.checkButton:GetChecked(), self:GetParent().roles.dps.checkButton:GetChecked() ) -- where lead, tank, healer, dps are booleans, may set with role check button clicks ClearAllLFGDungeons(LE_LFG_CATEGORY_LFD) SetLFGDungeon(LE_LFG_CATEGORY_LFD, 288) JoinLFG(LE_LFG_CATEGORY_LFD) SetLFGRoles(leader,tank,healer,dps) end

Scripts.OnLoad: local dungeonName, typeID, subtypeID,_,_,_,_,_,_,_,backgroundTexture,difficulty,_,dungeonDescription, isHoliday, bonusRepAmount, _, isTimewalker = GetLFGDungeonInfo(288) self.title:SetText(dungeonName) self.description:SetText(dungeonDescription) LFG_UpdateAvailableRoles(self.roles.tank, self.roles.healer, self.roles.dps)
